review_data.title: Fraud
review_data.content: I drank 6 beer and they charged me 8. They weren't compliant even after pointing out the error. When now reading other commentaries here, it gives the impression that this might be an institutionalized fraud scheme which they are running.

review_data.title: Great Irish Pub in the Middle of Zürich!

review_data.title: The best value

review_data.title: Very Expensive

review_data.title: Cheers!
review_data.content: Being a big fan of Kilkenny and Guinness, I'm a relatively frequent visitor to Kennedy's. There is always a nice group of people around, lively atmosphere, cozy interior and nice service. Never disappoints.

review_data.title: Good place for a drink and a talk
review_data.content: I came to Kennedy's to have a drink and a talk with some friends and coworkers. Kennedy's was perfect for this purpose: a talk over a drink or two in a buzzing atmosphere. The service was excellent: the waitress was very attentive and served us...More

review_data.title: Nicely decorated Irish Pub with very agreeable music volume

review_data.title: Para ver un partido y cenar sin arruinarse

review_data.title: Rude bouncers

review_data.title: Good Pub, friendly staff
review_data.content: Kennedy's is my favourite pub in Zurich, the prices are fair, food is good (try the burgers) and the staff is friendly. I enjoy watching live sports there aswell, the screens are big and they show almost every Premier League game.

review_data.title: Overpriced Expat Magnet
review_data.content: Prices were high and the food average, generous portions by Zurich standards.. Wide selection of beers and that's really what people come here for. The outdoor seating was packed with smokers. Regardless it's popular and full most evenings. Service was prompt, courteous and available in...More

review_data.title: Great food and Great Atmosphere

review_data.title: feel at home here!

review_data.title: Perfect for a brunch!
review_data.content: We had the brunch on sunday, the location is nice, near the city center and inside everybody spek english!

review_data.title: Wow, those Home Made Chips (=Fries)

review_data.title: Beers and Sports
review_data.content: wow i just miss Kennedy Guinness beer. Kennedy's Irish Pub is an excellent place to hangout with friends, Enjoy football match..Drink lots of Beers and eat lots of food and Cheer up the good evening. Must visit if you are in Zurich

review_data.title: Best Pub in Zurich
review_data.content: Good service, great pub grub, well decorated, decent pub crowd, spacious. Good choice of ales, fried calimari to die for 10/10. Its a pub nof a michelin star restaurant!

review_data.title: Chilli sans carne, sans chilli
review_data.content: Terrible "chilli con carne". Had the terrible experience in trying it. Lots of rice some sweet souce and almost no meet. Yes-yes no chilli in it either. Beers is good, burger seemed to be ok.

review_data.title: Viel zu LAUT!, Bierauswahl ok, Essen nicht besonders

review_data.title: Fun Irish pub
review_data.content: The food is good, in my opinion better than the other pub alternatives, however, on a couple of occasions the food was under cooked. It is quickly becoming one of my favourite place to grab a couple of beers

review_data.title: Second visit was actually enjoyable, compared to the disaster of my first visit.
review_data.content: I visited on the weekend and this was a follow-up visit from my earlier terrible experience at Kennedy’s. Upon arrival for an early lunch the place was not busy. I ordered a cheeseburger CHF 23.50 (which includes fries and a small serving of cole slaw)...More

review_data.title: Irish?
review_data.content: Last time I was there they only had 2 Irish beers; the menu was all over the place: Italian, Asian, American, ... In an Irish Pub I want to discover new Irish beers, listen so some Irish music ....

review_data.title: Good spot for a pint and a bite
review_data.content: Group dinner during a meeting. Large table. Good beer selection. Excellent fish & chips. Other than that an average Irish bar.

review_data.title: Worst burgers in town

review_data.title: Great place!
review_data.content: Location is excellent with very good public transport connections. Very spacious with some large tables (excellent for big groups). Food is very good and better quality then most regular restaurants i tried in town! Very friendly staff. All in all highly recommended!

review_data.title: Good pub which makes you feel welcome with good fish n chips

review_data.title: Great for hanging out
review_data.content: The pub had an old-fashioned look with old-style decorations on the wall, but everything seemed clean and new--which I really liked. No stale cigarette smoke lingering around like in other places. This bar is really spacious and has a lot of different kinds of beer...More

review_data.title: Very nice lunch!

review_data.title: Perfect for after work drinks & now also brunch available
review_data.content: We discovered it by chance by Zürich HB and it has become a meeting point for every Thursday. In the evenings it gets a bit packed, but service and ambiance are worthy. They have started to serve also brunch and we happened to book for...More
